channel.description: Recent content in monitoring on Blog Indonesiadot.Com

item.title: simple alert monitoring using simplemonitor
item.description: googling: https://www.google.com/search?q=simple+alert+monitoringhttps://jamesoff.github.io/simplemonitor/<br />googling: https://www.google.com/search?q=simplemonitor+dockerhttps://hub.docker.com/r/braindoctor/simplemonitor-docker/<br />mkdir -p /docker/simplemonitor && cd /docker/simplemonitorcat > docker-compose.yml <version: ‘3.2'services:simplemonitor:restart: alwaysimage: braindoctor/simplemonitor-docker:latestcontainer_name: simplemonitorhostname: mail-124.indonesiadot.comvolumes:- ${PWD}/config:/etc/simplemonitorports:- “8080:8080"EOFdocker-compose up -dref:https://simplemonitor.readthedocs.io/en/feature-docs/getting-started.html#writing-configuration-files</div>

item.title: All about icinga monitoring
item.description: icinga2 installation on ubuntu 16https://www.icinga.com/docs/icinga2/latest/doc/02-getting-started/<br>https://www.icinga.com/docs/icingaweb2/latest/doc/02-Installation/<br>https://www.rosehosting.com/blog/install-icinga-2-on-ubuntu-16-04/<br>https://blog.x-toolz.com/installing-icinga2-icingaweb2-on-ubuntu-16-04-3-lts/<br>https://github.com/jpfluger/examples/blob/master/ubuntu-14.04/icinga2-server.md<br><br><b>https://www.google.co.id/search?q=icinga2+change+ssh+port</b><br><br>https://monitoring-portal.org/woltlab/index.php?thread/32752-ssh-monitoring-different-port/<br><br><div style="background-color: #fafafa; border: 0px; box-sizing: inherit; color: #2c3e50; font-family: "Open Sans", Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; min-width: 0px; padding: 0px;“>added a line into the servicedefinition:Codeapply Service “ssh” {import “generic-service"check_command = “ssh"vars.port = host.vars.ssh_portassign where host.address && host.vars.os == “Linux"ignore where host.name == “localhost” /* for upgrade safety */}and in the hostdef:Codeobject Host “webarchiv” {…vars.ssh_port = 1023…
